channel.description: An aggregated feed of Microsoft blogs

item.title: What's New: Create your own codeless data connector
item.description:
Today we're announcing the general availability of the Codeless Connectors Platform (CCP) in Microsoft Sentinel that provides partners, advanced users, and developers the ability to create custom connectors for ingesting data to Microsoft Sentinel.
How is this CCP different from the previous version? The initial version of the CCP was announced in January of 2022. Since then, we've improved upon the platform and the legacy release is no longer recommended. This new version of the CCP has the following key improvements:
Better support for various authentication and pagination types.
Suppo...
